props.app: If true, attaches to the closest layout and positions according to the value of **location**.
props.appear: Used to control the animation of the FAB.
props.extended: An alternate style for the FAB that expects text.
props.location: The location of the fab relative to the layout. Only works when using **app**.
props.offset: Translates the Fab up or down, depending on if location is set to **top** or **bottom**.
